Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class the operates the GUI and Production Tracker.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addToListView()
      Associates the global ObservableList 'productLine' which holds existing products with the ListView located on the 'Produce' tab of the GUI.
      void addToProductDb()
      Takes the user input from the 'Product Line' tab of the GUI and inserts it into the database.
      void addToProductionDb​(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionRecord> productionRun)
      Inserts a produced product into the database.
      static void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection to the database.
      int getMaxSerialNum​(int idNum)
      Gets the latest serial number based on the product id given.
      java.lang.String getProductName​(int idNum)
      Gets the name of the product based on the product id given.
      void loadProductionLog()
      Scans the production database and creates a ProductionRecord for each product produced, then displays that to the 'Production Log' tab in the GUI.
      void loadProductList()
      Scans the database for existing products and populates the global ObservableList 'productLine'.
      static void openConnection()
      Opens the connection to the database.
      void populateChoiceBox()
      Generates the different ItemTypes available to create on 'Product Line' tab.
      void populateComboBox()
      Generates integers 1-10 in the 'Choose Quantity' box located on the 'Produce' tab of the GUI.
      void resetProductFields()
      Used to reset the fields in the 'Product Line' tab after the user clicks the 'Add Product' button on the 'Product Line' tab of the GUI.
      void setupProductLineTable()
      Associates the global ObservableList 'productLine' which holds existing products with the TableView located on the 'Product Line' tab of the GUI.
      void showProduction​(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionRecord> productionRecords)
      Displays the ProductionRecord for each product on the 'Production Log' tab.

        Gets the latest serial number based on the product id given.

        Returns:

      • addToProductionDb

        public void addToProductionDb​(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionRecord> productionRun)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Inserts a produced product into the database.
        Parameters:
        productionRun - holds 'n' quantity ProductionRecords for how many products are being produced
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - for invalid or irregular product inputs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - for invalid or irregular product inputs

      • loadProductionLog

        public void loadProductionLog()
        Scans the production database and creates a ProductionRecord for each product produced, then displays that to the 'Production Log' tab in the GUI.

      • showProduction

        public void showProduction​(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionRecord> productionRecords)
        Displays the ProductionRecord for each product on the 'Production Log' tab. Used by loadProductionLog().
        Parameters:
        productionRecords - hold the ProductionRecord for each item that has been produced in the database

        public void addToProductDb()
                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Takes the user input from the 'Product Line' tab of the GUI and inserts it into the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - for irregular or invalid user input

        public void loadProductList()
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
